CheckInPanel.title: Check-in

howItWorks.title: How it works
steps: * Scan the QR from the Pack app.
* Sign the challenge with your wallet (Privy).

CheckInPanel.footnote: Every verified check-in adds HOWL and preps your wallet for future token perks.

MentorBooking.title: Schedule
MentorBooking.subtitle: Pick a slot and share your objective.

QuestsPage.title: Quest of the day

VotingList.title: Demo Day
VotingList.footnote: Voting requires Self verification and HOWL Wolf tier.

VotingPage.title: Voting requirements
VotingPage.description: You need Self verification and HOWL Wolf level to vote. Keep your streak active.

hero.title: Moon rewards
hero.description: Complete advanced quests and vote on Demo Day to unlock perks ahead of HOWL utility.

metrics.title: Metrics dashboard

ShowcasePage.title: Share your demo
ShowcasePage.description: Keep your repo, demo, and short docs refreshed in Notion.

success.title: Verification complete
success.body: Your identity is confirmed. Explore Wolf Den without limits.

intro.title: Verify with Self
intro.body: Scan the QR with the Self app to sync your identity with the pack.
intro.mobile: Open the Self app on this device to sync your identity with the pack.
intro.mobileHint: The button launches the Self app. Once approved, you’ll return here automatically.
intro.mobileUnavailable: Mobile deep link not configured yet. Set NEXT_PUBLIC_SELF_DEEPLINK_CALLBACK to enable the button.
intro.mobileQrHidden: QR hidden on mobile. Enable it above if you need to scan from another device.

missingConfig.title: Self verification unavailable
missingConfig.body: Set the following env vars before verifying: {vars}.
missingConfig.hint: Add them to .env.local and restart the dev server.

missingWrapper.title: Self QR unavailable
missingWrapper.body: The QR component from @selfxyz/qrcode is not available. Check the package version.

hero.label: Identity & Trust
hero.description: Secure your identity to unlock voting, check-ins, and pack perks. Scan with the Self app to confirm.

tips: • Make sure you're on a trusted network.
• If it fails, refresh the QR and try again.

intro.title: Mines
intro.description: Mind Games MVP flows. Keep the original look while we wire Self-powered logic.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Toggle themes to match your workspace.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose the locale for navigation and content copy.

hero.tagline: Wolf Den Labs — ship fast. play smarter.
hero.title: The pack’s on-chain event lab and digital command center
hero.subtitle: For builders, organizers, mentors, and sponsors running crypto-powered experiences.
hero.description: Spin up ruleta and animal race mini-games, trigger instant payouts, and guide your community through mentorship routes without leaving the lab. Wolf Den Labs keeps the pack’s builder DNA alive while event captains orchestrate unforgettable on-chain moments.
hero.visionQuote: "Wolf Den Labs unifies our builder control center with live event ops so every payout, mentor slot, and sponsor touchpoint runs in the same flow."

metrics.label: Why packs choose the lab
metrics.title: Event ops supercharged by builders
metrics.description: From instant payouts to Taberna itineraries, Wolf Den Labs keeps organizers, mentors, and sponsors aligned in one command center.

pillars.label: Strategic Pillars
pillars.title: How the lab delivers
pillars.description: The original Wolf Den control center now powers event organizers with live payouts, mentorship loops, and sponsor-ready surfaces.

items.title: Builder Core
items.description: Modular Next.js infrastructure from the pack keeps every mini-game, quest, and data feed easy to extend.

items.title: Live Event Ops
items.description: Organizers import attendees, wire prize pools, and launch ruleta or races with instant crypto rewards.

items.title: Mentor & Sponsor Loop
items.description: Taberna itineraries and branded skins stay in sync so learning and monetization happen in the same experience.

HomeLanding.modulesDescription: Operate events, extend mini-games, and keep the pack aligned without leaving the Wolf Den Labs command center.

modules.title: Event Control Panel
modules.description: Import attendees, capture wallets, and trigger payouts from one screen.

modules.title: Mini-Games Lab
modules.description: Launch ruleta and animal race engines with sponsor skins and live leaderboards.

modules.title: Taberna Mentorship
modules.description: Route players into mentorship missions before and after each event.

modules.title: Builder Extensions
modules.description: Deploy quests and automations from the builder collective to enhance your event loop.

modules.title: Sponsor Showcase
modules.description: Feature partners, prizes, and proofs-of-win with live links and media.

modules.title: Insights & Reporting
modules.description: Review payouts, engagement, and retention metrics to plan the next activation.

items.title: Set up your event
items.description: Import attendees, lock prize pools, and assign mentor routes in minutes.

items.title: Run live mini-games
items.description: Fire ruleta or animal races, reward winners instantly, and showcase sponsors on-screen.

items.title: Close the loop
items.description: Send players to Taberna mentorship, export insights, and tee up the next activation.
